TopicTitle: [0.25] Lionhead Aerospace Inc. - Icarus v0.4 updated

Articles.Content:
Hi, I think you download a corrupted file. Try to redownload it.

It's updated to 0.20

Im sorry to bother you, but its the same. None of my parts are showing up now. I even did a fresh install of the game. I placed my other mods back in. checked them. they work fine. I install this one and nothing shows up. Im not sure what im doing wrong.

Im sorry to bother you, but its the same. None of my parts are showing up now. I even did a fresh install of the game. I placed my other mods back in. checked them. they work fine. I install this one and nothing shows up. Im not sure what im doing wrong.

Try just to copy the lionhead folder.

Try just to copy the lionhead folder.

Thank you for your fast response. I have it working now but i dont understand why. I deleted the plugin and everything started working good. Is it using a different plugin from another mod? btw thank you for your time and work on the mods. we all appreciate it very much

EDIT I searched for another mod that used mumechlib.dll plugin and it did the same thing. once i deleted it, everything worked fine. Is this something i did?

Edited May 31, 2013 by viperwolf

Thank you for your fast response. I have it working now but i dont understand why. I deleted the plugin and everything started working good. Is it using a different plugin from another mod? btw thank you for your time and work on the mods. we all appreciate it very much

EDIT I searched for another mod that used mumechlib.dll plugin and it did the same thing. once i deleted it, everything worked fine. Is this something i did?

Mumechlill.dll is currently broken.
When is the Icarus(copy of Pegasus) going to be completÃƒÂ©?

When is the Icarus(copy of Pegasus) going to be completÃƒÂ©?

I'll reactive this developpement next week as the Ariane5 and ATV are ready for a release.

Finally, the ESA European Historical Pack is released. The pack includes ATV and Ariane 5 launcher. Now you can send ATV into orbit to resupply ISS station.

Download LH_ESApack v0.1
In the ariane 5 craft file you forgot to add the ATV back!

Very cool.

I'm not sure which ones I'll crash more, these new rockets or the newest version of KSP.

Thank you, now I'm off to the VAB.
Suestra didn't make a video Oh well, this rocket is amazing, And the pics are amazing too

Awesome to finally get Ariane 5. One question. You supplied the ATV and Ariane 5 as separate .craft files, I got the ATV into a subassemby but there's no node on the base to attach it to the Ariane 5 payload bay?

Got it, subassembly loader bugged it because of the silly build direction rules in KSP. The 'free' node was at the top, not the bottom. I hate that, it's very annoying (not LH or SubAssembly's fault, I think it's the game) :\

Edited June 1, 2013 by MDBenson
Awesome stuff, Yogui! Keep up the great work!!!!

I found another couple of little things?

If you limit ascent speed to 'terminal velocity' in MechJeb 2.0.8 it doesn't throttle up the main engine and the staging bugs out. That's possibly not your fault though. I guess Ariane 5 just climbs very fast on the SRBs!

EDIT: Even with that option off and only 'prevent overheats' selected, MJ 2.0.8 is not burning the main engine if I let the autopilot handle the take-off automatically (which I have to as I'm aligning with a 51-degree orbital plane to get to my station).

EDIT 2: The batteries are dying on the launchpad. That's why it won't fly. *facepalm* I guess that's what Launch Support towers are for

EDIT 3: ATV Needs a bigger battery. It had 13 units left when I separated from the main stage. I had to scramble the solar arrays out early to get some charge in! Maybe a 150 or 175 battery capacity would be better?

There's no decoupler on the EPS module to part it from ATV? Did I miss a part somewhere? I hit the staging and the two didn't separate?

Edited June 1, 2013 by MDBenson
Yogui have you thought about doing the Hermes? I think it would be perfect for the ESA pack.

Are you going to release a version of the SRBs without all the flags?

Too un-russian for me to use.
anyone able to link .craft file for ATV+Ariane 5 for some reason I just cant get them to join together.

Are you going to release a version of the SRBs without all the flags?

Too un-russian for me to use.

You could do it.

Yogui have you thought about doing the Hermes? I think it would be perfect for the ESA pack.

[0.20.x] Hermes Deep Space Probe: The Ã¢â‚¬Å“Hermes deep space probeÃ¢â‚¬Â by Lionhead Aerospace is a Ã¢â‚¬Å“Voyager probeÃ¢â‚¬Â replica.

Like this??

I found another couple of little things?

If you limit ascent speed to 'terminal velocity' in MechJeb 2.0.8 it doesn't throttle up the main engine and the staging bugs out. That's possibly not your fault though. I guess Ariane 5 just climbs very fast on the SRBs!

EDIT: Even with that option off and only 'prevent overheats' selected, MJ 2.0.8 is not burning the main engine if I let the autopilot handle the take-off automatically (which I have to as I'm aligning with a 51-degree orbital plane to get to my station).

EDIT 2: The batteries are dying on the launchpad. That's why it won't fly. *facepalm* I guess that's what Launch Support towers are for

EDIT 3: ATV Needs a bigger battery. It had 13 units left when I separated from the main stage. I had to scramble the solar arrays out early to get some charge in! Maybe a 150 or 175 battery capacity would be better?

There's no decoupler on the EPS module to part it from ATV? Did I miss a part somewhere? I hit the staging and the two didn't separate?

I didn't test Ariane with mechJeb, so try not to use it. About the batteries, they're suffisant for ATV (very low enrgy drain). If you need more batteries, add some or edit cfg files.

About EPS decoupler, you're right, I forgot making one. I plane it for the next update with a twin payload system. About the decoupler between stage 1 and 2, it's the fuel tank (AdvSAS icon, icon editing seems to be broken).

Yogui have you thought about doing the Hermes? I think it would be perfect for the ESA pack.

Yes that could be a nice spacecraft. If you don't hear anything about it in a couple of weeks, ask me again.

Are you going to release a version of the SRBs without all the flags?

Too un-russian for me to use.

Here the same texture without flags: http://www./?3us98l2ph7k0q62

Just paste the file in the EAP folder.

anyone able to link .craft file for ATV+Ariane 5 for some reason I just cant get them to join together.
